translations: v．浪费（时间、金钱等）：把时间、金钱等用在琐事或无意义的事情上。
· He spent the whole day frittering away his time on video games.
他整天都在玩电子游戏上浪费时间。

sentences.sentence: The firm soon started frittering away the cash it was generating.
sentences.translation: 这家公司马上开始挥霍刚赚来的钱。

sentences.sentence: You have been compelled to cultivate your reflective faculties for want of occasions for frittering your life away in silly trifles.
sentences.translation: 你不得不培养你思考的能力，因为你没有必要把生命消耗在愚蠢的琐事中。

sentences.sentence: You've spent enough time frittering away your energies trying to help other people out of dilemmas they actually enjoyed being part of.
sentences.translation: 花费你足够的时间和精力试着帮助其他人他们实际享受的角色。
